articles.title: Walmart has the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi soft serve machine at its best price, but this treat is going fast
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: The Ninja Swirl by CREAMi is on sale at Walmart for $349 instead of $350. The machine has 13 one-touch programs and 6 soft serve options. The CreamiFit program is new for the Swirl and inspired by the health-conscious community's adoration for protein ice cream.

articles.title: Alexa will soon be able to order your groceries, too
articles.author: Daniel Miller
articles.summary: Alexa+ will be available in the U.S. in March. It will work with Amazon Fresh and other grocery partners collaborating with Amazon. Amazon is offering Alexa+ for $19.99 per month, but Amazon Prime members can access it for free as part of their annual membership.

articles.title: Aldi launches bizarre flavoured Baileys dupe Guinness fans will love… and it can even be made into a cocktail
articles.author: Sophie Warburton
articles.summary: Aldi's Ballycastle Stout Flavour Country Cream is priced at £7.99 a bottle. It's a flavoured Baileys dupe and can be made into a cocktail. The drink hits shelves on March 6 and is available while stocks last. Aldi also provides a recipe for BallyCastle Stout Espresso Martini.

articles.title: We maintain silky smooth skin all winter, thanks to these 9 best body oils
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Nuxe Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil is the best body oil for dry skin. Neutrogena Body Oil Light Sesame Formula is effective and effective despite its drugstore price. Emma Sutton-Williams likes the sweet, sunny smell that leaves her skin soft and dewy.

articles.title: AI is creating unrealistic expectations for clients of stylists, vendors and designers
articles.summary: Public Radio For Eastern North Carolina airs on 89.3 WTEB New Bern 88.5 WZNB New Bern 91.5 WBJD Atlantic Beach 90.3  WKNS Kinston 88.3, WHYC Swan Quarter 89.9 W210CF Greenville and PRE Classical.

articles.title: New Site Ready for Beta Testing March 3, 2025 2:46 PM Subscribe
articles.summary: The beta version of the new MetaFilter site is ready for testing. The database is populated with fake users, posts, and comments for testing at https://www.metastaging.net/. The primary goal of this round of testing is to validate that existing site features have either been reproduced accurately or have been improved. There will be a focused round of development for mobile devices.

articles.title: Grievance redressal issues by online platforms under Karnataka govt scanner
articles.author: Sonal Choudhary
articles.summary: Chatbots and smart prompts can handle some issues, but they fall short when it comes to resolving genuine customer or citizen grievances. @Swiggy, @zomato and other quick commerce and e-commerce platforms must improve to solve these issues for customers.

articles.title: AI Press Release Generators: The Future of Seamless News Distribution
articles.summary: The PR Builder uses AI to create professional press releases in minutes. It offers guaranteed placements on top-tier news platforms like MarketWatch, Benzinga, GlobeNewswire, Business Insider, and more. The PR Builder's built-in distribution feature ensures the release gets published on high-traffic media platforms.

articles.title: reAlpha's AiChat Unveils Next-Gen AI Agents
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: There are forward-looking statements in this press release about the announcement of AiChat's AI Agents, Voice AI and Agentic AI and future trends in the real estate, technology and artificial intelligence industries. ReAlpha's future results, level of activity, performance or achievements may differ from those contemplated, expressed or implied by the forward looking statements.

articles.title: reAlpha's AiChat Unveils Next-Gen AI Agents
articles.author: re Alpha Tech Corp.
articles.summary: AiChat Pte. Ltd. is launching its AI-powered digital agents: Voice AI and Agentic AI. The global autonomous AI and autonomous agents market is witnessing rapid expansion and is expected to reach $783.27 billion by 20371. MYDIN, one of Malaysia's largest retail chains, has used AiChat's AI to enhance its customer service.

articles.title: I use this Nespresso every day — save 23% on an editor-favorite coffee machine
articles.author: Jennifer Gonick
articles.summary: The Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ coffee maker is on sale at Amazon for a limited time. It brews five sizes of coffee pods, from single espresso shots to 12-ounce cups of coffee. The Pop+ has a convenient compartment that collects used pods as you go. It comes in eight colors.

articles.title: Regulator wants oil companies to avoid transportation via road
articles.author: Sanjeev Choudhary
articles.summary: Oil companies should avoid road transportation of bulk petroleum products over long distances and instead use railways or captive pipelines of their competitors, the downstream regulator has said in its latest safety guidelines. The guidelines were issued in the wake of an LPG tanker accident near Jaipur last December, which killed about 20 people. PNGRB has sought to turn state-run oil companies' captive fuel pipelines into common carrier facilities.

articles.title: Superdream and QuantPlus officially enter partnership
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Superdream is partnering with QuantPlus so businesses and brands can better access 'AI-powered creative intelligence'. Superdream is the first Australian marketing agency to provide its clients with access to AI-powered intelligence. It will help them identify the highest-performing ad elements across any product, industry, or market.

articles.title: Google VP of Ads bets on AI to transform ads into tailored consumer journeys
articles.author: Anu Adegbola
articles.summary: Google's Ads and Commerce product lead, Vidhya Srinivasan, today outlined how the company is reimagining advertising as 'avenues for tailored exploration' in response to unpredictable consumer behavior. Google is focusing on three key solutions to help advertisers break through: AI, relevant content and trusted creator relationships.

articles.title: East Gainesville native continues to grow her business selling seasoning blends
articles.author: Cleveland Tinker
articles.summary: Quenella Clark, a Gainesville native, launched "Miss Nola's Seasoning Blends" in 2020. The company's seasonings are sold online and in select stores, including Ward's Supermarket in Gainesville. Clark's goal is to expand distribution to major chain stores and open a Cajun restaurant.

articles.title: Why LG's 340L Bottom Mount Fridge Instaview is the perfect size for an apartment
articles.author: Matilda Rudd
articles.summary: The Bottom Mount Fridge Instaview costs $1,599 on LG's website and can be purchased on JB Hi-Fi and Harvey Norman's website. It's a fridge with a view screen that shows the contents of the fridge without opening the door. It comes with a 10 year parts warranty.

articles.title: What's new on the latest generation of Porsche 911 Carrera
articles.author: Jamie Nonis
articles.summary: The new Porsche 911 Carrera is the 8th generation of the iconic sports car. The base model has a twin-turbo 3.0-litre boxer engine set-up with a charge-air cooler, located above the engine directly under the rear grille, taken from the previous-generation 911 Turbo. It's also been fitted with the turbochargers from the GTS models of the previous generation. The new base model also has a more powerful 353 kW (480 PS) flat-six engine. It can be driven in 3.9 seconds with the Sport Chrono package.

articles.title: Huawei showcases its new tri-foldable phone
articles.summary: Huawei's new tri-foldable phone was unveiled at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona. Xiaomi and Lenovo also introduced their latest products at the event, including the Xiaomi 15 Ultra's advanced camera and Lenovo's ThinkBook lineup. Google's AI Gemini stand attracted visitors interested in the new AI advancements.

articles.title: I tried the most realistic AI voice companion ever created - if ChatGPT or Gemini ever gets this good, reality is in trouble
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Sesame is a conversational AI that mimics how people talk. It's designed to perform like a human in its failures, not like a perfect customer service agent. The secret sauce is Sesame's Conversational Speech Model (CSM), which blends text and audio into a single process.

articles.title: Kaltura Launches AI-Powered ‘TV Genie', Powering Hyper-Personalized Entertainment Experiences and Streamlining Content Enrichment and Curation  Mar. 3, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Kaltura's TV Genie is a new AI-powered entertainment experience for live and on-demand streaming. TV Genie has over 50 beta-release participants, including large enterprises, education institutions, and media and telecom companies. Reshet 13, one of Israel's largest broadcasters, uses TV Genie and Content Lab to produce concise, impactful news segments from its flagship hour-long evening news program.

articles.title: This Wild Phone Concept Lets You Add a Full-Size Camera Lens to Take Photos
articles.author: Mike Sorrentino
articles.summary: Chinese phone-maker RealMe is showing off a camera-like phone concept at Mobile World Congress 2025 in Barcelona. The Interchangeable-lens concept allows you to change the lens on the phone like on a high-end mirrorless camera. It uses a 1-inch customized Sony sensor and a proprietary lens mount system.

articles.title: UGG's Tasman slipper is gone for good — here's the new style taking its place
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG Tasman II and Tazz slippers have been released. The Tazz II has a higher platform sole and a smooth suede upper. It has a lightweight sole and is detailed with the UGGbraid and UGG logo. It costs $120.

articles.title: I found Amazon deals that'll save you up to 80%: Snag record-low prices on Apple and more
articles.summary: Apple iPad Mini (A17 Pro) for $399 (was $499) is an all-time low on Amazon. Eddie Bauer Reversible Blanket for $14 is nearly 70% off. Lefant M210 Robot Vacuum for $89 is all time low. Cozsinoor Bed Pillows, Queen, 2-pack for $25 is an 80% off, while a Tempur-Pedic queen mattress topper is marked down by 50%.

articles.title: I Tried Starbucks' Iced Cherry Chai From The Spring 2025 Menu
articles.summary: Starbucks has introduced a new Iced Cherry Chai, Cherry Cream Cold Foam and a new Sunsera Blend coffee to its menu this spring. The new chai is tasty, but not as good as the old one. The coffee is easy-to-sip and versatile, so it's more my style.

articles.title: ‘Looks heavenly', shoppers scramble to try new flavour of Ben & Jerry's on UK supermarket shelves for the first time
articles.author: Elizabeta Ranxburgaj
articles.summary: Ben & Jerry's will launch a new Sweet Mango Memories ice cream in time for summer. The new product will be made of sweet cream ice cream and have mango swirls and white chunks throughout. Tesco was selling tubs for £2.85 with Clubcard last month.

articles.title: Why perfect timing beats perfect products — every time
articles.author: Matt Watson
articles.summary: Matt Watson is the host of Product Driven and co-founder of Full Scale, a global staffing company. He has lived through the highs and lows of market timing. Success is about having the right idea at the right time, not about being first.

articles.title: Why do escalators have brushes? Their secret purpose most people don't know
articles.author: TOI Trending Desk
articles.summary: Escalator brushes are a safety feature designed to prevent escalator accidents. They act as a barrier between the steps and the side panel of the escalator and prevent people from getting their belongings caught in the gap. They also serve as a warning to keep people from stepping too close to the edge.

articles.title: Amazon's buzzing delivery drones drove a Texas town to fight back
articles.summary: Nvidia's record earnings reveal just 3 customers make up 30% of revenue. Amazon's Prime Air drone program is still struggling to get off the ground more than 11 years after Jeff Bezos first teased half-hour deliveries in a publicity stunt on 60 Minutes. Last year in College Station, Texas, residents complained about the noise of Amazon's 80-pound-or-so drones. The company has three roles listed about 100 miles away from College Station in Austin.

articles.title: Five cheap ingredients to make your batter better this Pancake Day
articles.author: Lana Clements
articles.summary: It's Pancake Day and it's time to ditch the basic pancake batter. With just one or two cheap ingredients, you can transform your pancake stacks into budget showstoppers. The Salter Kuro mixer in black is a stylish addition to any kitchen and costs £69.99 at Currys.

articles.title: Lenovo's ThinkBook Flip Puts an Extra-Tall Folding Display On a Laptop
articles.summary: Lenovo has teased its ThinkBook "codename Flip" AI PC Concept at Mobile World Congress. It features a flexible 18.1-inch OLED display that can transform between three configurations: a traditional clamshell, a folded 12.9-inch screen and a flat screen.

articles.title: 'I would recommend this over Dyson' - rival vacuum drops to £84 at Amazon
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: The vacuum cleaner has a battery life of 40 minutes and can be charged in 18 minutes. British customers have been quick to sing its praises in their reviews. The vacuum has a green light built in to help spot dirt and the brush works wonders on pet hair. However, not all reviews are glowing.

articles.title: Refresh NTX founder said appearance on Kelly Clarkson show an ‘out of body experience'
articles.author: Star Local Media
articles.summary: Frisco's Refresh NTX provides hygiene products to students across North Texas. The company will be featured in an upcoming episode of The Kelly Clarkson Show. The website requires Javascript to be able to read the content. The page has been updated to reflect the new information.

articles.title: Lenovo demos AI Stick prototype that promises to give the power of AI to any PC thanks to a 32-TOPS NPU
articles.author: Wayne Williams
articles.summary: The AI Display and the AI Stick were showcased at MWC 2025. The AI Display has a built-in discrete NPU that adds intelligent features to the monitor and can also add AI functionality to non-AI laptops or desktops. AI Stick is a small brick-like device that connects to any non-NPU-equipped PC via a USB-C Thunderbolt port.

articles.title: Is Velveeta Real Cheese?
articles.author: Dennis Lee
articles.summary: Velveeta is a pasteurized process cheese product, which means it's cheese-ish, but it's not actually cheese. American cheese is a "pasteurized processed American cheese food" that also contains cheese. Velveeta and American cheese are not the same thing.

articles.title: This Browser Will Soon Feature an AI Agent That Can Accomplish Tasks for You
articles.author: Brent Dirks
articles.summary: Opera has just announced a new AI agent called Browser Operator that runs inside the browser. It is available as a preview but Opera says it will launch more widely as part of an AI Feature Drop program in 'the near future'. OpenAI unveiled its ChatGPT Operator earlier this year that can interact with multiple sites to accomplish different tasks.

articles.title: Stryd welcomes new head of product
articles.author: Will Paige
articles.summary: Cheok Lee has been appointed head of product at open banking platform Stryd. He will work closely with Moneycatcha's founder Ruth Hatherley on the business's product offering. StryD is a real-time product and pricing database used by mortgage brokers to find borrowers the best loan.

articles.title: 6 upgrades SteamOS needs to dethrone Windows
articles.author: Jacob Roach
articles.summary: Decky Loader is a plugin launcher for SteamOS that includes a list of community-contributed plugins. SteamOS is missing a lot of functionality out of the box because it's designed for a console-like gaming experience. The best thing Valve can do is to expose new users to the tools in the Steam Deck. Game Mode in SteamOS needs to be easier to access.

articles.title: WhaZoodle? WhaZ THAT?
articles.summary: The WhaZoodle is a fun, interactive audio device that looks and works like any portable audio device but is preloaded with podcasts, music and other audio content. It's from the Playaway company that also makes the popular 'Launchpad' devices. Prince William Public Libraries is bringing it to patrons.

articles.title: Get more than 50% off on the fan-favorite Nugget Ice Maker this week at Walmart
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Simzlife Nugget Ice Maker is on sale for $150 (was $400). It produces up to 35 pounds of nugget ice in 24 hours. Self-cleaning function keeps the ice maker clean and hygienic with the simple press of a button. It's compact and efficient and consumes only 1 kWh per 8 hours.

articles.title: The tablet that replaced my Kindle and iPad is finally getting a successor
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: TCL is launching a new version of its Nxtpaper 11 Plus tablet. It will be the company's first AI-powered tablet with Text Assist, Writing Assist, Google's Circle to Search, and many more functionalities woven into apps. Kerry Wan is a fan of the TCL Nxt paper technology.

articles.title: How to change your default gateway on Linux - and get back online fast
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: The default gateway address (also known as the "default gateway") is a crucial address on your computer. It acts as a sort of a bridge between your local network and the internet. Most ISPs set the default gateway to 192.168.1.1 and assign the address via DHCP.

articles.title: Framework is Rethinking Laptops and Mini-PCs With Customization and Power – Hands-on Impressions
articles.author: Michael Higham
articles.summary: The Framework Laptop 13 and Laptop 16 are modular and customizable high-performance laptops. The Framework Desktop shares a similar design philosophy for a mini-PC that packs a serious punch. The Compact Laptop 12 is more compact, but has a capacitive touchscreen and the keyboard can fold all the way back to function like a tablet. The next batch of the Laptop will be shipped in May 2025.

articles.title: MWC 2025 Live Blog: Phones, Wearables, Robots and AI Live From Barcelona
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Experience MWC 2025 live with our blog bringing you updates on the new phones, wearable devices and AI announcements. It's also bringing updates on new phones and wearable devices. It also brings updates on smartwatches and AI-related announcements. The blog is updated daily.

articles.title: Pistachio spread by the spoonful and other wonderful food and drink our food writer tried this month
articles.author: Melanie Giandzi
articles.summary: Mel Giandzi is our senior food and drink writer. She gets hundreds of emails every month about the newest products that have launched. The following list has been carefully recommended as her top favourites for this month. She will be updating this page monthly to share her favourite products.

articles.title: MIGO Mobile launches in Nigeria to bridge digital divide
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: MIGO Mobile has officially entered Nigeria's mobile device market. It aims to bridge the nations digital gap by offering affordable, high-quality smartphones and laptops. The Managing Director of the company was speaking yesterday in Lagos. He said the company will focus on mobile devices.

articles.title: I tried Google's new tool that calls businesses for you to get information. Here's how helpful it actually is.
articles.author: Ana Altchek
articles.summary: Google launched its "Ask for me" tool on Search Labs a little over a month ago. It uses AI to call businesses near you to find out how much a service costs and when it's available. It's only available for nail salons and auto shops and requires opt-in to try it.

articles.title: I tried Google's 'Ask for me' tool. It's limited in capability for now, but I could see it saving me hours.
articles.author: Ana Altchek
articles.summary: Google launched its "Ask for me" tool on Search Labs a little over a month ago. It uses AI to call businesses for service details and availability. Currently, the tool is limited to nail salons and auto shops and requires users to opt in. If the tool expands to medical offices and customer service lines, it could be a game changer.

articles.title: I tried Google's new tool that calls businesses for you to get information. Here's how helpful it actually is.
articles.summary: Google launched its "Ask for me" tool on Search Labs a little over a month ago. It uses AI to call businesses for service details and availability. For now, it only works for nail salons and auto shops. If the tool expands to medical offices and customer service lines, it could be a game changer.

articles.title: Google's 'ask for me' tool could be a huge time-saver in the future. It's not there yet.
articles.summary: Google launched its "ask for me" tool on Search Labs a little over a month ago. It uses artificial intelligence to call businesses near you to find out how much a service costs and when it's available. The tool is limited to nail salons and auto shops and requires users to opt in. If Google expands the tool, it could be a game changer.

articles.title: 15 Lucrative Digital Products People Sell for Extra Cash
articles.author: Josh Hasting
articles.summary: Creating and selling digital products can be a great way to earn extra cash. People can diversify their income sources, achieve financial stability, and pursue their passions by leveraging their skills and creativity to create valuable digital products. These products can also be made once and sold multiple times, providing a passive income stream.

articles.title: Shoppers love Next's 'softer than usual' flared jeans that cost just £32
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Shoppers are raving about a pair of jeans from Next that are made from 'gorgeous stretchy denim' and cost £32. They are machine washable and made with a mix of 72% cotton, 20% recycled polyester, 6% viscose and 2% elastane.

articles.title: Lenovo showcases a USB-C connected AI Stick with a 32 TOPS NPU on board
articles.author: Mark Tyson
articles.summary: Lenovo has unveiled the Lenovo AI Stick at MWC 2025 in Barcelona. The USB-C Thunderbolt connected stick conceals a 32 TOPS NPU to enable local AI-accelerated goodies. It's compatible with Lenovo's AI Now suite, which needs Windows 11 and an x86 CPU to run.

articles.title: Amazon gadget that's a 'game changer' for quick meals and 'leaves no mess' reduced to £27
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers have been impressed by a kitchen gadget that makes perfect toasties every time and is easy to clean afterwards. The large plates have enough space for up to three paninis at once, while the floating top plate accommodates different sandwich thicknesses and rests firmly on the bread for even toasting.

articles.title: Ninja shoppers snap up 'easy clean' non-stick frying pan reduced to £23 for Pancake Day
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Pancake Day is on March 4. There's still time to order a new frying pan. Ninja's is exclusive to Ninja and has the brand's Zerostick technology. Lakeland's is also a popular option. The Ninja pan has been hailed as a 'game-changer' by shoppers.

articles.title: AI-Powered Font Generators: The Future of Inclusive Typography
articles.summary: AI-powered font generation tools are breaking barriers in the design industry. They allow crafters, small business owners, advertising agencies, AI enthusiasts, and even complete beginners to create unique, high-quality fonts in minutes. Creative Fabrica's Font Generator is one of the most popular AI-powered design tools.

articles.title: TCL Launches First AI-Powered Tablet, the TCL NXTPAPER 11 Plus, at MWC - Bringing Unparalleled Versatility, Personalization and Comfort
articles.summary: TCL announced the launch of the TCL NXTPAPER 11 Plus Tablet at Mobile World Congress 2025. It is the brand's first AI-powered tablet. The tablet has an 11.5-inch, 2.2K high-resolution screen with 120Hz refresh rate. It's the first device enabled with TCL's proprietary display technology. It has Smart Eye Comfort Mode and Personalized Eye Comfort mode. It also has Text Assist and Writing Assist.

articles.title: Testing Out Black Water's Fluff & Buff Hair Mousse: Does It Deliver Volume?
articles.author: Arianne Lacanilao
articles.summary: Black Water's Fluff & Buff Hair Mousse is an effortless way to add volume to your hair without spending too much time styling. Arianne Lacanilao put it to the test on her naturally black hair and found it to be effective.

articles.title: Unable to share feedback on Meesho? Try these steps
articles.summary: The feedback section is categorized into product quality, order and delivery experience, customer service, and general app issues. For delivery-related complaints, provide the order number and a brief description of the issue. For product quality and customer service complaints, describe your experiences.

articles.title: Lenovo's AI Ring Let Me Control a 3D PC With a Click of My Fingers Like a Wizard
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: Lenovo's concept AI smart ring allows for gesture-based control of Lenovo's ThinkBook 3D Laptop. In the demo, the ring was able to flick through a presentation of slides simply by clicking with thumb and middle finger. It's important to remember that this is just a concept for now, and as a concept, it's one I liked.

articles.title: This reusable gel, down to $7, pulls grime from car crevices like a magnet
articles.summary: Pulidiki Cleaning Gel is cheap and easy to use. It can be used to clean hard-to-reach places in your car and home. Over 3,500 Amazon shoppers are five-star fans of this cleaning gel. If you have Amazon Prime, you'll get free shipping.

articles.title: Infinix Zero concept shows how flip phones can be even more pocket-friendly
articles.summary: Infinix has shown off a new concept phone at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona. The Infinix Zero Serios Mini Tri-Fold concept has two hinges, so it can fold into a more compact form. It's not clear if this concept will make it out of the prototype stage and into production.

articles.title: Gemini could soon answer all your app queries without leaving the Play Store
articles.author: Karandeep Singh Oberoi
articles.summary: Some Google Play Store users are starting to see the new "Ask a question" tool which uses AI to answer user queries about app listings. The new section does not yet exist for me, but Android Authority reports it has started to appear for some users. To check if the section has rolled out to you, check listings for apps like Instagram, X, Facebook and WhatsApp.

articles.title: Tata Nexon facelift engine
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Tata Motors is gearing up to redefine the compact SUV segment with the launch of the Tata Nexon Facelift, a facelift of the Nexon SUV.    Read more at: http://www.businessinsider.com/tata-nexon-facelift.

articles.title: Tata Nexon 2027 EV
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Tata Motors is gearing up to redefine the compact SUV segment with the launch of the Tata Nexon Facelift, a facelift of the Nexon SUV.    Read more at: http://www.businessinsider.com/tata-nexon-facelift.

articles.title: Gemini live video and screensharing arrive on Android devices later this month
articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.summary: Mobile World Congress 2025 kicked off in Barcelona. Google is previewing two AI features that will begin rolling out to Android devices starting later this month. The first is Live Video, which Google first showed at I/O 2024 last May. The other is screensharing, which allows you to share your screen with Gemini to ask questions about what you see in front of you.

articles.title: I tested Xiaomi 15 Ultra: first impressions of 'the ultimate smartphone camera'
articles.author: Mark Kavanagh
articles.summary: Xiaomi 15 Series is the firm's biggest push yet into the premium smartphone market in Ireland. It features high-end camera systems, cutting-edge processors, and fast-charging capabilities. Xiaomi's WQHD+ 6.73in AMOLED display delivers a pin sharp resolution of 3200 x 1440, a laudable pixel density of 22 pixels per inch, and 3,200 nits of peak brightness. The phone is powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite system-on-a-chip (SoC).

articles.title: HMD's Amped Buds in-ears sport a unique, hidden trick
articles.summary: HMD Global's new Amped Buds offer up to 1,600mAh of wireless charge. They are wireless earbuds with a charging case that can top up the juice for any compatible wireless-charging phone. They have 95 hours of power reserve.

articles.title: Coach Outlet is selling a 'versatile' $398 satchel bag for only $159, and shoppers are 'obsessed'
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Sometimes, all you need is a bag that's just big enough to fit your daily necessities. The Street aims to feature only the best products and services. If you buy something via one of the links, TheStreet may earn a commission.    for this article.

articles.title: This PC has a folding screen that I wish I could buy
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: Lenovo's ThinkPad Flip AI PC Concept is a folding laptop concept. It has an 18-inch display that folds outwards to create two 13-inch displays stacked on top of each other. The concept is user-friendly and has some software tricks that make it more than just a laptop.

articles.title: I used TCL's Nxtpaper screen tech, and it's ready to replace your e-reader
articles.author: Andy Boxall
articles.summary: TCL's Nxtpaper screen is unusual. It's designed to reduce eye strain, lower blue light emission and cut down on glare. It can switch between a full color mode called Color Paper and a full monochrome Max Ink mode with an e-paper-like look. It has a 120Hz refresh rate so it's easy on the eyes.

articles.title: Pour On the Perks: T-Mobile Treats Customers to a Free 7-Eleven Slurpee Drink Every Month
articles.summary: T-Mobile and Metro customers can get a free large Slurpee drink from participating 7-Eleven and Speedway stores every month. T-Mobile Tuesdays is a weekly celebration of free swag, exclusive perks and more to say 'thank you' to customers. Since introducing it in 2016, customers have racked up over 500 million dining deals, 74 million pizza perks and 56 million discounted movie tickets.

articles.title: 5 Best Lenovo Ideapad Laptops Of March 2025: Do They Stand Up To Your Expectations?
articles.summary: IdeaPad laptops are popular but are they the best Lenovo has to offer? It depends on what you expect from a laptop. Students and office users benefit the most from IdeaPads. If you need a high-end gaming laptop, Lenovo's Legion series is better suited. For professional creators, the ThinkPad or Yoga series might be more powerful.

articles.title: Alation Announces Data Products Marketplace and Expert Services Offering to Operationalize Data Across the Enterprise
articles.summary: New offerings streamline data product management and empower data teams to deliver business impact faster while maintaining trust and compliance. Alation's new offerings enable businesses to efficiently operationalize data products at scale. More than 600 global enterprises rely on Alation to realize value from their data and AI initiatives.

articles.title: Maison Yusif makes history as first Ghanaian fragrance house to feature on Times Square and Washington D.C.'s iconic screens
articles.summary: Ghana's Maison Yusif has made history as the first fragrance house from Ghana and West Africa to showcase its creations on the iconic big screens of New York's Times Square and Washington D.C. The brand's presence on some of the world's most recognisable advertising platforms signals its growing influence in the luxury fragrance industry.

articles.title: Danone launches Skyr yoghurts and drinks range in the UK
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: Danone has expanded its dairy portfolio with the launch of a branded Skyr range for the UK market. Danone Skyr is an Icelandic-style yoghurt that is high in protein, 0% fat and a source of calcium. The range will be rolling out in Tesco from 26 February, Ocado from 3 March and Sainsbury's from 30 April.

articles.title: Make cinnamon roll pancakes with ‘genius' and simple recipe
articles.author: Ellen Jenne
